to activate the environment -> .venv\Scripts\activate
to remove dir of venv -> rmdir /s venv
pip install cv2
pip install pytesseract
python manage.py runserver. ->to start the servers
python -m pip install django
cd directory path to locate the exact path
pip install openpyxl
pip install sqllite3
tesseract --version
g++ --version
python manage.py  migrate
pip install sqllite3
pip install ipykernel
pip install --upgrade pip
pip install --trusted-host pypi.org--trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org--trusted-host pypi.python.org ipykernel
